sentences.en: a large organization with offices throughout the world
sentences.cn: 在世界各地都设有办事处的一家大型机构

sentences.en: A windstorm in Washington is causing power outages throughout the region.
sentences.cn: 风暴造成整个华盛顿地区电力供应中断。

sentences.en: Both sides were troubled throughout by a capricious wind.
sentences.cn: 双方一直在为风向飘忽不定而苦恼。

sentences.en: He continued throughout to restate his opposition to violence.
sentences.cn: 他一直不断重申他反对暴力。

sentences.en: He maintained an ambivalent attitude to the Church throughout his long life.
sentences.cn: 在他漫长的一生中，他对基督教信仰始终是一种摇摆不定的态度。

sentences.en: Men in green army uniforms are sprinkled throughout the huge auditorium.
sentences.cn: 穿着绿色军服的人星星点点地分布在整个大礼堂中。

sentences.en: New Year's Day is a public holiday throughout Britain.
sentences.cn: 元旦是全英国的公众假日。

sentences.en: Premiums are guaranteed throughout the term of the policy.
sentences.cn: 在保单有效期内，所缴纳的保险费是有保障的。

sentences.en: Riot police are being deployed throughout the city to prevent any trouble.
sentences.cn: 正在全城部署防暴警察以防止发生骚乱。

sentences.en: The craze for roller skating spread throughout the U.S.
sentences.cn: 滑旱冰在全美风靡一时。

sentences.en: The disease spread rapidly throughout Europe.
sentences.cn: 疾病迅速在整个欧洲蔓延开来。

sentences.en: The first song, "Blue Moon," didn't go too badly except that everyone talked throughout.
sentences.cn: 第一首歌《蓝月亮》效果还不算太差，只是所有的人自始至终都在说话。

sentences.en: The house is in excellent condition, with fitted carpets throughout.
sentences.cn: 这幢房子状况极好，全部铺着地毯。

sentences.en: The route is well sign-posted throughout.
sentences.cn: 这条路线全程设有路标。

sentences.en: The temperature remained below freezing point throughout the day.
sentences.cn: 一整天气温都在零度以下。

sentences.en: The three acts will alternate as headliners throughout the tour.
sentences.cn: 这3个节目将在整个巡回演出中轮流打头牌。

sentences.en: There was something of this mood running throughout the Congress's deliberations.
sentences.cn: 国会的商讨过程中一直透露出几分这样的情绪。

sentences.en: They would have liked bare wooden floors throughout the house.
sentences.cn: 他们本想在整个房间的木地板上都不铺地毯的。

sentences.en: This is happening in every school throughout the country.
sentences.cn: 全国各地每所学校都在发生这样的事情。

sentences.en: Throughout, she illustrates her analysis with excerpts from discussions.
sentences.cn: 自始至终，她摘引讨论内容来阐明她的分析。

sentences.en: We are open every weekend throughout the year.
sentences.cn: 我们全年每个周末都对外开放。

trans.tran_en: in every part of a particular area, place etc

trans.tran_cn: 遍及；在…各处；在整个期间，自始至终
trans.tran_en: in every part of a particular area, place etc
